title: ICE: explicit panic: compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code code from a former version of `./src/libarena/lib.rs` ```Rust struct TypedArenaChunk { next: Option<~TypedArenaChunk>, } impl TypedArenaChunk { fn new() -> ~TypedArenaChunk {} } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.61.0-nightly (1bfe40d11 2022-03-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1bfe40d11c3630254504fb73eeccfca28d50df52 commit-date: 2022-03-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: `~` cannot be used as a unary operator --> lib.rs:2:18 | 2 | next: Option<~TypedArenaChunk>, | ^ help: use `!` to perform bitwise not error: invalid const generic expression --> lib.rs:2:18 | 2 | next: Option<~TypedArenaChunk>, | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | help: expressions must be enclosed in braces to be used as const generic arguments | 2 | next: Option<{ ~TypedArenaChunk>, | + + error: unmatched angle bracket --> lib.rs:2:37 | 2 | next: Option<~TypedArenaChunk>, | ^ help: remove extra angle bracket error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:508:21 ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:508:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f1a0569d9dd -
